title: New: Giraffage – Feels
content:
A new track from Giraffage you say? Ah, the perfect remedy for those post-Festival blues.

Slightly cliched vocal samples and excessive use of ‘chillwave techniques’ make up the majority of the track, yet it works brilliantly, coming across all floaty and mystical. Feels is taken from an as yet untitled EP due out later in the year. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
